text: Meggen is a municipality of the district Lucerne-Land in the canton of Lucerne in Switzerland. ==Gallery== File:Meggen 308.jpg|Meggen seen from Pilatus File:Schloss Neuhabsburg.jpg|Neuhabsburg Castle File:Schloss Meggenhorn, mit Sicht auf das luzerner Seebecken.jpg|Meggenhorn Castle ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of Meggen Category:Municipalities in Lucerne- Land
title: Meggen, Switzerland
